nodes.text: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back: Activity Book

Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back: Activity Book is a fully illustrated activity book based on the original trilogy film Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back. It was published by Egmont UK Ltd on June 4, 2015.
It was one of three activity books released, along with Star Wars: A New Hope: Activity Book and Star Wars: Return of the Jedi: Activity Book.
